name: Avinoam Kolodny
content: Avinoam Kolodny Professor of Electrical Engineering Department of Electrical Engineering VLSI Systems Research Center Technion-Israel Institute of Technology Haifa 32000, Israel Office: EE 809 Phone: +972-4-829-4764 Fax: +972-4-832-3041 Email: kolodny@ee.technion.ac.il BSc 1975; MSc 1977, DSc 1980, Technion IEEE fellow 2016
